Hello everyone,

I kind of figured that since this group was the first one=
 that I ever
talked to about my entrance into the unexplained and EVP, I fi=
gured I
would give an update. I will be the first to contest that what you =
hear
is something that's definitely there. After I continued to get nothing=

but negative experiences during my EVP, I decided to just forget it.
Well =
the things messing with me have not really agreed with me on that.

Just la=
st Friday, I went to a party of my friends and I took a picture
of somethin=
g odd. This is a real picture folks and I challenge anyone to
find a made u=
p flaw in it. The first one circles the entities and the
second one is just=
 the original file. I know this doesn't pertain
much to the EVP realm, but =
it's a follow up from an experience of
one, which now proves the legitimacy=
 off this field=85..pictures
always speak a thousand words.

I really would=
 like to think that I am too stubborn for anything even
more serious to hap=
pen, as I am just considering them a nuisance now. I
will be seeking a high=
er power either today or very soon. If you guys
don't hear from me again, I=
 just may be possessed=85.<gulps>

ike I am going crazy.

look

o knock then and they get mad and say they have no

ink I am just crazy at this point. I asked

velop and say things

hing and got

n started

a result I forever will be one now.

r and I open the small glass door

ed off, saying I tricked them.

ic, vile and disturbing

 thought of doing

m reaction,

 prayer

s it

r how "A" nightclub was

ally go to "B"

nd call

e

 most of the night praying, until I called my

f them, neither have on this

em to do my job just

pt

> o=
n, but I haven't tried to use the recording or recorder any further,

 refuse to continue it without any guidance. I figure its best to

hem, like my brother said. Maybe someone can help me

is. Even if I have gotten rid of these things

really spent a bunch of time making this

om someone in the know. I know it

 as true. I am new to this

 some kind of insight

<FONT size=3D"2">
<P>Hello everyone,</P>
<P>I kind of figured that since th=
is group was the first one that I ever talked to about my entrance into the=
 unexplained and EVP, I figured I would give an update. I will be the first=
 to contest that what you hear is something that's definitely there. After =
I continued to get nothing but negative experiences during my EVP, I decide=
d to just forget it. Well the things messing with me have not really agreed=
 with me on that. </P>
<P>Just last Friday, I went to a party of my friends=
 and I took a picture of something odd. This is a real picture folks and I =
challenge anyone to find a made up flaw in it. The first one circles the en=
tities and the second one is just the original file. I know this doesn't pe=
rtain much to the EVP realm, but it's a follow up from an experience of one=
, which now proves the legitimacy off this field=85..pictures always speak =
a thousand words. </P>
<P>I really would like to think that I am too stubbo=
rn for anything even more serious to happen, as I am just considering =
them a nuisance now. I will be seeking a higher power either today or very =
soon. If you guys don't hear from me again, I just may be possessed=85.<=
gulps></P>
